code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import SearchForm from'./SearchForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const apiKey=process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY;console.log(apiKey);const apiURLBase='https://api.spoonacular.com/recipes';function App(){const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);const handleSearchByIngredients=async ingredients=>{const endpoint='/findByIngredients';const urlToFetch=`${apiURLBase}${endpoint}?apiKey=${apiKey}&ingredients=${ingredients}&number=5`;try{const response=await axios.get(urlToFetch);setRecipes(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"What's in your fridge?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchForm,{onSearch:handleSearchByIngredients}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecipeList,{recipes:recipes})]});};export default App;
